setup_script_description: sets focus on the 'Style/Color' menu item
task: read checked menuitemcheckbox in a group in a submenu
specific_user_instruction: Open 'Style/Color' menu with down arrow. | Navigate to 'Italic' menu item and check it by pressing enter. (the menu will close.) | Re-open 'Style/Color' menu with down arrow. | Navigate to 'Italic' menu item. | Read the 'Italic' menu item checkbox
output_assertions: The role 'menu item checkbox' is conveyed
The position of the item and number of items in the 'Font Style ' group are conveyed
The name and role of the 'Font Style' group are conveyed
